column6: "MONSTROUS" The epic story pitting the X-Men and the Marvel Monsters comes to a startling conclusion! Rising star Nick Bradshaw (UNCANNY X-MEN ANNUAL) joins writer Daniel Way (DEADPOOL) to bring you the most exciting monster fight ever shown in a comic.
column8: | penciller (cover):Guru-eFX | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | penciller:Nick Bradshaw | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Rachelle C Rosenberg | writer:Daniel Way
